briefdescription.para: Creates a new InventoryVector object from serialised data.
Gets a InventoryVector from another object. Use this to avoid casts.

parameterdescription.para: The object to obtain the InventoryVector from.

memberdef.argsstring: (InventoryVector *self, InventoryVectorType type, ByteArray *hash, void(*onErrorReceived)(Error error, char *,...))
memberdef.name: initializeInventoryVector

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: Initialises a InventoryVector object from serialised data.

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: Deserialises a InventoryVector so that it can be used as an object.

simplesect.para: The length read on success, 0 on failure.

briefdescription.para: Serialises a InventoryVector to the byte data.

simplesect.para: The length written on success, 0 on failure.
